author: Phil Helsel
description: Ousted Acting Attorney General Sally Yates says Sean Spicer mischaracterized her warnings about Michael Flynn, NBC News reports.
title: Sally Yates: ‘There was nothing casual’ about Mike Flynn warning

author: Euan McKirdy and Saba Hamedy, CNN
description: Former acting Attorney General Sally Yates on Tuesday shot down the White House's efforts to downplay the severity of her warnings about former national security adviser Michael Flynn.
title: Yates: 'There was nothing casual about this'
